attributes.action: Close down Norwich University of the Arts to contain the spread of Covid-19
attributes.additional_details: To prevent the virus spreading among students and into student accommodation thus preventing 1000s of students being infected
attributes.background: Close down Norwich University of the Arts to contain the spread of Covid-19

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300628

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
